name: Dangerous Isles
description:
Dangerous Isles is simple infinite-runner game. Buy new characters and upgrades, try to reach more and more levels and break your owns records!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys - movement.
  • ESC - close Shop.
  • Double click on Shop item to buy or wear it.

Known issues:

  • If Sprint or Invulnerability abilities don't work, try to change character to another and back.
